title: Kamiusagi Rope x Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
original_name: 「紙兎ロぺ」×「BORUTO-ボルト- NARUTO NEXT 　 GENERATIONS」
sinopse: A 3-way collaboration between Kamiusagi Rope, Boruto: Naruto Next Generations, and TOHO Cinemas. The purpose is to promote a new TOHO theater opening up in Ueno on November 4, 2017. The collaboration video will also be available to view in TOHO Cinemas in Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, and Saitama from Ocotober 21 - December 1.
